location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter states that a copy of item IOR/R/15/1/2, ff 2-3 was enclosed with it and gives the details of recent sales of woolens and cloth. The letter also reports that Garden has procured a phirmaund [firman] from the Vakeel [Karim Khan] for Mr Smith with the intention of Smith staying in Bushire to transact his private business. This step is described as 'unprecedented and contrary to the rules of the service'.
